verses.content: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا الصَّالِحُونَ وَمِنَّا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ كُنَّا طَرَائِقَ قِدَدًا
verses.translation: 'There are among us some that are righteous, and some the contrary; we are groups each having a different way (religious sect, etc.).

verses.content: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّا أَن لَّن نُّعْجِزَ اللَّهَ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَلَن نُّعْجِزَهُ هَرَبًا
verses.translation: 'And we think that we cannot escape (from the punishment of) Allah in the earth, nor can we escape (from the punishment) by flight.

verses.content: وَأَنَّا لَمَّا سَمِعْنَا الْهُدَىٰ آمَنَّا بِهِ ۖ فَمَن يُؤْمِن بِرَبِّهِ فَلَا يَخَافُ بَخْسًا وَلَا رَهَقًا
verses.translation: 'And indeed when we heard the Guidance (this Quran), we believed therein (Islamic Monotheism), and whosoever believes in his Lord shall have no fear, either of a decrease in the reward of his good deeds or an increase in punishment for his sins.

verses.content: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا الْمُسْلِمُونَ وَمِنَّا الْقَاسِطُونَ ۖ فَمَنْ أَسْلَمَ فَأُولَـٰئِكَ تَحَرَّوْا رَشَدًا
verses.translation: 'And of us some are Muslims (who have submitted to Allah, after listening to this Quran), and of us some are Al-Qasitun (disbelievers those who have deviated from the Right Path)'. And whosoever has embraced Islam (i.e. has become a Muslim by submitting to Allah), then such have sought the Right Path."

verses.content: وَأَمَّا الْقَاسِطُونَ فَكَانُوا لِجَهَنَّمَ حَطَبًا
verses.translation: And as for the Qasitun (disbelievers who deviated from the Right Path), they shall be firewood for Hell,

verses.content: وَأَن لَّوِ اسْتَقَامُوا عَلَى الطَّرِيقَةِ لَأَسْقَيْنَاهُم مَّاءً غَدَقًا
verses.translation: If they (non-Muslims) had believed in Allah, and went on the Right Way (i.e. Islam) We should surely have bestowed on them water (rain) in abundance.

verses.content: لِّنَفْتِنَهُمْ فِيهِ ۚ وَمَن يُعْرِضْ عَن ذِكْرِ رَبِّهِ يَسْلُكْهُ عَذَابًا صَعَدًا
verses.translation: That We might try them thereby. And whosoever turns away from the Reminder of his Lord (i.e. this Quran, and practice not its laws and orders), He will cause him to enter in a severe torment (i.e. Hell).

verses.content: وَأَنَّ الْمَسَاجِدَ لِلَّهِ فَلَا تَدْعُوا مَعَ اللَّهِ أَحَدًا
verses.translation: And the mosques are for Allah (Alone), so invoke not anyone along with Allah.

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُ لَمَّا قَامَ عَبْدُ اللَّهِ يَدْعُوهُ كَادُوا يَكُونُونَ عَلَيْهِ لِبَدًا
verses.translation: (It has been revealed to me that) When the slave of Allah (Muhammad SAW) stood up invoking (his Lord Allah) in prayer to Him they (the jinns) just made round him a dense crowd as if sticking one over the other (in order to listen to the Prophet's recitation).

verses.content: قُلْ إِنَّمَا أَدْعُو رَبِّي وَلَا أُشْرِكُ بِهِ أَحَدًا
verses.translation: Say (O Muhammad SAW): "I invoke only my Lord (Allah Alone), and I associate none as partners along with Him."

verses.content: قُلْ إِنِّي لَا أَمْلِكُ لَكُمْ ضَرًّا وَلَا رَشَدًا
verses.translation: Say: "It is not in my power to cause you harm, or to bring you to the Right Path."

verses.content: قُلْ إِنِّي لَن يُجِيرَنِي مِنَ اللَّهِ أَحَدٌ وَلَنْ أَجِدَ مِن دُونِهِ مُلْتَحَدًا
verses.translation: Say (O Muhammad SAW): "None can protect me from Allah's punishment (if I were to disobey Him), nor should I find refuge except in Him.

verses.content: إِلَّا بَلَاغًا مِّنَ اللَّهِ وَرِسَالَاتِهِ ۚ وَمَن يَعْصِ اللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ فَإِنَّ لَهُ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا أَبَدًا
verses.translation: "(Mine is) but conveyance (of the truth) from Allah and His Messages (of Islamic Monotheism), and whosoever disobeys Allah and His Messenger, then verily, for him is the Fire of Hell, he shall dwell therein forever."

verses.content: حَتَّىٰ إِذَا رَأَوْا مَا يُوعَدُونَ فَسَيَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ أَضْعَفُ نَاصِرًا وَأَقَلُّ عَدَدًا
verses.translation: Till, when they see that which they are promised, then they will know who it is that is weaker concerning helpers and less important concerning numbers.

verses.content: قُلْ إِنْ أَدْرِي أَقَرِيبٌ مَّا تُوعَدُونَ أَمْ يَجْعَلُ لَهُ رَبِّي أَمَدًا
verses.translation: Say (O Muhammad SAW): "I know not whether (the punishment) which you are promised is near or whether my Lord will appoint for it a distant term.

verses.content: عَالِمُ الْغَيْبِ فَلَا يُظْهِرُ عَلَىٰ غَيْبِهِ أَحَدًا
verses.translation: "(He Alone) the All-Knower of the Gha'ib (unseen), and He reveals to none His Gha'ib (unseen)."

verses.content: إِلَّا مَنِ ارْتَضَىٰ مِن رَّسُولٍ فَإِنَّهُ يَسْلُكُ مِن بَيْنِ يَدَيْهِ وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِ رَصَدًا
verses.translation: Except to a Messenger (from mankind) whom He has chosen (He informs him of unseen as much as He likes), and then He makes a band of watching guards (angels) to march before him and behind him.

verses.content: لِّيَعْلَمَ أَن قَدْ أَبْلَغُوا رِسَالَاتِ رَبِّهِمْ وَأَحَاطَ بِمَا لَدَيْهِمْ وَأَحْصَىٰ كُلَّ شَيْءٍ عَدَدًا
verses.translation: [He (Allah) protects them (the Messengers)], till He sees that they (the Messengers) have conveyed the Messages of their Lord (Allah). And He (Allah) surrounds all that which is with them, and He (Allah) keeps count of all things (i.e. He knows the exact number of everything).

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ يَا أَيُّهَا الْمُزَّمِّلُ
verses.translation: O you wrapped in garments (i.e. Prophet Muhammad SAW)!

verses.content: قُمِ اللَّيْلَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا
verses.translation: Stand (to pray) all night, except a little.

verses.content: نِّصْفَهُ أَوِ انقُصْ مِنْهُ قَلِيلًا
verses.translation: Half of it, or a little less than that,

verses.content: أَوْ زِدْ عَلَيْهِ وَرَتِّلِ الْقُرْآنَ تَرْتِيلًا
verses.translation: Or a little more; and recite the Quran (aloud) in a slow, (pleasant tone and) style.

verses.content: إِنَّا سَنُلْقِي عَلَيْكَ قَوْلًا ثَقِيلًا
verses.translation: Verily, We shall send down to you a weighty Word (i.e. obligations, legal laws, etc.).

verses.content: إِنَّ نَاشِئَةَ اللَّيْلِ هِيَ أَشَدُّ وَطْئًا وَأَقْوَمُ قِيلًا
verses.translation: Verily, the rising by night (for Tahajjud prayer) is very hard and most potent and good for governing (the soul), and most suitable for (understanding) the Word (of Allah).

verses.content: إِنَّ لَكَ فِي النَّهَارِ سَبْحًا طَوِيلًا
verses.translation: Verily, there is for you by day prolonged occupation with ordinary duties,

verses.content: وَاذْكُرِ اسْمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلْ إِلَيْهِ تَبْتِيلًا
verses.translation: And remember the Name of your Lord and devote yourself to Him with a complete devotion.

verses.content: رَّبُّ الْمَشْرِقِ وَالْمَغْرِبِ لَا إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ فَاتَّخِذْهُ وَكِيلًا
verses.translation: (He Alone is) the Lord of the east and the west, La ilaha illa Huwa (none has the right to be worshipped but He). So take Him Alone as Wakil (Disposer of your affairs).

verses.content: وَاصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَاهْجُرْهُمْ هَجْرًا جَمِيلًا
verses.translation: And be patient (O Muhammad SAW) with what they say, and keep away from them in a good way.

verses.content: وَذَرْنِي وَالْمُكَذِّبِينَ أُولِي النَّعْمَةِ وَمَهِّلْهُمْ قَلِيلًا
verses.translation: And leave Me Alone to deal with the beliers (those who deny My Verses, etc.), and those who are in possession of good things of life. And give them respite for a little while.

verses.content: إِنَّ لَدَيْنَا أَنكَالًا وَجَحِيمًا
verses.translation: Verily, with Us are fetters (to bind them), and a raging Fire.

verses.content: وَطَعَامًا ذَا غُصَّةٍ وَعَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
verses.translation: And a food that chokes, and a painful torment.

verses.content: يَوْمَ تَرْجُفُ الْأَرْضُ وَالْجِبَالُ وَكَانَتِ الْجِبَالُ كَثِيبًا مَّهِيلًا
verses.translation: On the Day when the earth and the mountains will be in violent shake, and the mountains will be a heap of sand poured out and flowing down.

verses.content: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا إِلَيْكُمْ رَسُولًا شَاهِدًا عَلَيْكُمْ كَمَا أَرْسَلْنَا إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ رَسُولًا
verses.translation: Verily, We have sent to you (O men) a Messenger (Muhammad SAW) to be a witness over you, as We did send a Messenger [Musa (Moses)] to Fir'aun (Pharaoh).

verses.content: فَعَصَىٰ فِرْعَوْنُ الرَّسُولَ فَأَخَذْنَاهُ أَخْذًا وَبِيلًا
verses.translation: But Fir'aun (Pharaoh) disobeyed the Messenger [Musa (Moses)], so We seized him with a severe punishment.

verses.content: فَكَيْفَ تَتَّقُونَ إِن كَفَرْتُمْ يَوْمًا يَجْعَلُ الْوِلْدَانَ شِيبًا
verses.translation: Then how can you avoid the punishment, if you disbelieve, on a Day that will make the children grey-headed (i.e. the Day of Resurrection)?

verses.content: السَّمَاءُ مُنفَطِرٌ بِهِ ۚ كَانَ وَعْدُهُ مَفْعُولًا
verses.translation: Whereon the heaven will be cleft asunder? His Promise is certainly to be accomplished.

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذِهِ تَذْكِرَةٌ ۖ فَمَن شَاءَ اتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِ سَبِيلًا
verses.translation: Verily, this is an admonition, therefore whosoever will, let him take a Path to His Lord!

verses.content: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَعْلَمُ أَنَّكَ تَقُومُ أَدْنَىٰ مِن ثُلُثَيِ اللَّيْلِ وَنِصْفَهُ وَثُلُثَهُ وَطَائِفَةٌ مِّنَ الَّذِينَ مَعَكَ ۚ وَاللَّهُ يُقَدِّرُ اللَّيْلَ وَالنَّهَارَ ۚ عَلِمَ أَن لَّن تُحْصُوهُ فَتَابَ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ فَاقْرَءُوا مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنَ الْقُرْآنِ ۚ عَلِمَ أَن سَيَكُونُ مِنكُم مَّرْضَىٰ ۙ وَآخَرُونَ يَضْرِبُونَ فِي الْأَرْضِ يَبْتَغُونَ مِن فَضْلِ اللَّهِ ۙ وَآخَرُونَ يُقَاتِلُونَ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ ۖ فَاقْرَءُوا مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنْهُ ۚ وَأَقِيمُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَآتُوا الزَّكَاةَ وَأَقْرِضُوا اللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا ۚ وَمَا تُقَدِّمُوا لِأَنفُسِكُم مِّنْ خَيْرٍ تَجِدُوهُ عِندَ اللَّهِ هُوَ خَيْرًا وَأَعْظَمَ أَجْرًا ۚ وَاسْتَغْفِرُوا اللَّهَ ۖ إِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.translation: Verily, your Lord knows that you do stand (to pray at night) a little less than two-thirds of the night, or half the night, or a third of the night, and so do a party of those with you, And Allah measures the night and the day. He knows that you are unable to pray the whole night, so He has turned to you (in mercy). So, recite you of the Quran as much as may be easy for you. He knows that there will be some among you sick, others travelling through the land, seeking of Allah's Bounty; yet others fighting in Allah's Cause. So recite as much of the Quran as may be easy (for you), and perform As-Salat (Iqamat-as-Salat) and give Zakat, and lend to Allah a goodly loan, and whatever good you send before you for yourselves, (i.e. Nawafil non-obligatory acts of worship: prayers, charity, fasting, Hajj and 'Umrah, etc.), you will certainly find it with Allah, better and greater in reward. And seek Forgiveness of Allah. Verily, Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most-Merciful.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ يَا أَيُّهَا الْمُدَّثِّرُ
verses.translation: O you (Muhammad SAW) enveloped (in garments)!

verses.content: قُمْ فَأَنذِرْ
verses.translation: Arise and warn!

verses.content: وَرَبَّكَ فَكَبِّرْ
verses.translation: And your Lord (Allah) magnify!

verses.content: وَثِيَابَكَ فَطَهِّرْ
verses.translation: And your garments purify!

verses.content: وَالرُّجْزَ فَاهْجُرْ
verses.translation: And keep away from Ar-Rujz (the idols)!

verses.content: وَلَا تَمْنُن تَسْتَكْثِرُ
verses.translation: And give not a thing in order to have more (or consider not your deeds of Allah's obedience as a favour to Allah).

verses.content: وَلِرَبِّكَ فَاصْبِرْ
verses.translation: And be patient for the sake of your Lord (i.e. perform your duty to Allah)!

verses.content: فَإِذَا نُقِرَ فِي النَّاقُورِ
verses.translation: Then, when the Trumpet is sounded (i.e. its second blowing);

verses.content: فَذَٰلِكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ يَوْمٌ عَسِيرٌ
verses.translation: Truly, that Day will be a Hard Day.

verses.content: عَلَى الْكَافِرِينَ غَيْرُ يَسِيرٍ
verses.translation: Far from easy for the disbelievers.

verses.content: ذَرْنِي وَمَنْ خَلَقْتُ وَحِيدًا
verses.translation: Leave Me Alone (to deal) with whom I created Alone (without any means, i.e. Al-Walid bin Al-Mughirah Al-Makhzumi)!

verses.content: وَجَعَلْتُ لَهُ مَالًا مَّمْدُودًا
verses.translation: And then granted him resources in abundance.

verses.content: وَبَنِينَ شُهُودًا
verses.translation: And children to be by his side!

verses.content: وَمَهَّدتُّ لَهُ تَمْهِيدًا
verses.translation: And made life smooth and comfortable for him!

verses.content: ثُمَّ يَطْمَعُ أَنْ أَزِيدَ
verses.translation: After all that he desires that I should give more;

verses.content: كَلَّا ۖ إِنَّهُ كَانَ لِآيَاتِنَا عَنِيدًا
verses.translation: Nay! Verily, he has been stubborn and opposing Our Ayat (proofs, evidences, verses, lessons, signs, revelations, etc.).

verses.content: سَأُرْهِقُهُ صَعُودًا
verses.translation: I shall oblige him to (climb a slippery mountain in the Hell-fire called As-Sa'ud, or to) face a severe torment!

verses.content: إِنَّهُ فَكَّرَ وَقَدَّرَ
verses.translation: Verily, he thought and plotted;

verses.content: فَقُتِلَ كَيْفَ قَدَّرَ
verses.translation: So let him be cursed! How he plotted!

verses.content: ثُمَّ قُتِلَ كَيْفَ قَدَّرَ
verses.translation: And once more let him be cursed, how he plotted!

verses.content: ثُمَّ نَظَرَ
verses.translation: Then he thought;

verses.content: ثُمَّ عَبَسَ وَبَسَرَ
verses.translation: Then he frowned and he looked in a bad tempered way;

verses.content: ثُمَّ أَدْبَرَ وَاسْتَكْبَرَ
verses.translation: Then he turned back and was proud;

verses.content: فَقَالَ إِنْ هَـٰذَا إِلَّا سِحْرٌ يُؤْثَرُ
verses.translation: Then he said: "This is nothing but magic from that of old;

verses.content: إِنْ هَـٰذَا إِلَّا قَوْلُ الْبَشَرِ
verses.translation: "This is nothing but the word of a human being!"

verses.content: سَأُصْلِيهِ سَقَرَ
verses.translation: I will cast him into Hell-fire

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا سَقَرُ
verses.translation: And what will make you know exactly what Hell-fire is?

verses.content: لَا تُبْقِي وَلَا تَذَرُ
verses.translation: It spares not (any sinner), nor does it leave (anything unburnt)!

verses.content: لَوَّاحَةٌ لِّلْبَشَرِ
verses.translation: Burning the skins!

verses.content: عَلَيْهَا تِسْعَةَ عَشَرَ
verses.translation: Over it are nineteen (angels as guardians and keepers of Hell).

verses.content: وَمَا جَعَلْنَا أَصْحَابَ النَّارِ إِلَّا مَلَائِكَةً ۙ وَمَا جَعَلْنَا عِدَّتَهُمْ إِلَّا فِتْنَةً لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لِيَسْتَيْقِنَ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ وَيَزْدَادَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِيمَانًا ۙ وَلَا يَرْتَابَ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ وَالْمُؤْمِنُونَ ۙ وَلِيَقُولَ الَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ وَالْكَافِرُونَ مَاذَا أَرَادَ اللَّهُ بِهَـٰذَا مَثَلًا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُضِلُّ اللَّهُ مَن يَشَاءُ وَيَهْدِي مَن يَشَاءُ ۚ وَمَا يَعْلَمُ جُنُودَ رَبِّكَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ وَمَا هِيَ إِلَّا ذِكْرَىٰ لِلْبَشَرِ
verses.translation: And We have set none but angels as guardians of the Fire, and We have fixed their number (19) only as a trial for the disbelievers, in order that the people of the Scripture (Jews and Christians) may arrive at a certainty [that this Quran is the truth as it agrees with their Books i.e. their number (19) is written in the Taurat (Torah) and the Injeel (Gospel)] and the believers may increase in Faith (as this Quran is the truth) and that no doubts may be left for the people of the Scripture and the believers, and that those in whose hearts is a disease (of hypocrisy) and the disbelievers may say: "What Allah intends by this (curious) example?" Thus Allah leads astray whom He wills and guides whom He wills. And none can know the hosts of your Lord but He. And this (Hell) is nothing else than a (warning) reminder to mankind.

verses.content: كَلَّا وَالْقَمَرِ
verses.translation: Nay, and by the moon,

verses.content: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذْ أَدْبَرَ
verses.translation: And by the night when it withdraws,

verses.content: وَالصُّبْحِ إِذَا أَسْفَرَ
verses.translation: And by the dawn when it brightens,

verses.content: إِنَّهَا لَإِحْدَى الْكُبَرِ
verses.translation: Verily, it (Hell, or their denial of the Prophet Muhammad SAW, or the Day of Resurrection) is but one of the greatest calamities.

verses.content: نَذِيرًا لِّلْبَشَرِ
verses.translation: A warning to mankind,

verses.content: لِمَن شَاءَ مِنكُمْ أَن يَتَقَدَّمَ أَوْ يَتَأَخَّرَ
verses.translation: To any of you that chooses to go forward (by working righteous deeds), or to remain behind (by commiting sins),

verses.content: كُلُّ نَفْسٍ بِمَا كَسَبَتْ رَهِينَةٌ
verses.translation: Every person is a pledge for what he has earned,

verses.content: إِلَّا أَصْحَابَ الْيَمِينِ
verses.translation: Except those on the Right, (i.e. the pious true believers of Islamic Monotheism);

verses.content: فِي جَنَّاتٍ يَتَسَاءَلُونَ
verses.translation: In Gardens (Paradise) they will ask one another,

verses.content: عَنِ الْمُجْرِمِينَ
verses.translation: About Al-Mujrimun (polytheists, criminals, disbelievers, etc.), (And they will say to them):

verses.content: مَا سَلَكَكُمْ فِي سَقَرَ
verses.translation: "What has caused you to enter Hell?"

verses.content: قَالُوا لَمْ نَكُ مِنَ الْمُصَلِّينَ
verses.translation: They will say: "We were not of those who used to offer their Salat (prayers)

verses.content: وَلَمْ نَكُ نُطْعِمُ الْمِسْكِينَ
verses.translation: "Nor we used to feed Al-Miskin (the poor);

verses.content: وَكُنَّا نَخُوضُ مَعَ الْخَائِضِينَ
verses.translation: "And we used to talk falsehood (all that which Allah hated) with vain talkers.

verses.content: وَكُنَّا نُكَذِّبُ بِيَوْمِ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: "And we used to belie the Day of Recompense

verses.content: حَتَّىٰ أَتَانَا الْيَقِينُ
verses.translation: "Until there came to us (the death) that is certain."

verses.content: فَمَا تَنفَعُهُمْ شَفَاعَةُ الشَّافِعِينَ
verses.translation: So no intercession of intercessors will be of any use to them.

verses.content: فَمَا لَهُمْ عَنِ التَّذْكِرَةِ مُعْرِضِينَ
verses.translation: Then what is wrong with them (i.e. the disbelievers) that they turn away from (receiving) admonition?

verses.content: كَأَنَّهُمْ حُمُرٌ مُّسْتَنفِرَةٌ
verses.translation: As if they were frightened (wild) donkeys.

verses.content: فَرَّتْ مِن قَسْوَرَةٍ
verses.translation: Fleeing from a hunter, or a lion, or a beast of prey.

verses.content: بَلْ يُرِيدُ كُلُّ امْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ أَن يُؤْتَىٰ صُحُفًا مُّنَشَّرَةً
verses.translation: Nay, everyone of them desires that he should be given pages spread out (coming from Allah with a writing that Islam is the right religion, and Muhammad SAW has come with the truth from Allah the Lord of the heavens and earth, etc.).

verses.content: كَلَّا ۖ بَل لَّا يَخَافُونَ الْآخِرَةَ
verses.translation: Nay! But they fear not the Hereafter (from Allah's punishment).

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّهُ تَذْكِرَةٌ
verses.translation: Nay, verily, this (Quran) is an admonition,

verses.content: فَمَن شَاءَ ذَكَرَهُ
verses.translation: So whosoever will (let him read it), and receive admonition (from it)!

verses.content: وَمَا يَذْكُرُونَ إِلَّا أَن يَشَاءَ اللَّهُ ۚ هُوَ أَهْلُ التَّقْوَىٰ وَأَهْلُ الْمَغْفِرَةِ
verses.translation: And they will not receive admonition unless Allah wills; He (Allah) is the One, deserving that mankind should be afraid of, and should be dutiful to Him, and should not take any Ilah (God) along with Him, and He is the One Who forgives (sins).

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ لَا أُقْسِمُ بِيَوْمِ الْقِيَامَةِ
verses.translation: I swear by the Day of Resurrection;

verses.content: وَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِالنَّفْسِ اللَّوَّامَةِ
verses.translation: And I swear by the self-reproaching person (a believer).

verses.content: أَيَحْسَبُ الْإِنسَانُ أَلَّن نَّجْمَعَ عِظَامَهُ
verses.translation: Does man (a disbeliever) think that We shall not assemble his bones?

verses.content: بَلَىٰ قَادِرِينَ عَلَىٰ أَن نُّسَوِّيَ بَنَانَهُ
verses.translation: Yes, We are Able to put together in perfect order the tips of his fingers.

verses.content: بَلْ يُرِيدُ الْإِنسَانُ لِيَفْجُرَ أَمَامَهُ
verses.translation: Nay! (Man denies Resurrection and Reckoning. So) he desires to continue committing sins.

verses.content: يَسْأَلُ أَيَّانَ يَوْمُ الْقِيَامَةِ
verses.translation: He asks: "When will be this Day of Resurrection?"

verses.content: فَإِذَا بَرِقَ الْبَصَرُ
verses.translation: So, when the sight shall be dazed,

verses.content: وَخَسَفَ الْقَمَرُ
verses.translation: And the moon will be eclipsed,

verses.content: وَجُمِعَ الشَّمْسُ وَالْقَمَرُ
verses.translation: And the sun and moon will be joined together (by going one into the other or folded up or deprived of their light, etc.)

verses.content: يَقُولُ الْإِنسَانُ يَوْمَئِذٍ أَيْنَ الْمَفَرُّ
verses.translation: On that Day man will say: "Where (is the refuge) to flee?"

verses.content: كَلَّا لَا وَزَرَ
verses.translation: No! There is no refuge!

verses.content: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ الْمُسْتَقَرُّ
verses.translation: Unto your Lord (Alone) will be the place of rest that Day.

verses.content: يُنَبَّأُ الْإِنسَانُ يَوْمَئِذٍ بِمَا قَدَّمَ وَأَخَّرَ
verses.translation: On that Day man will be informed of what he sent forward (of his evil or good deeds), and what he left behind (of his good or evil traditions).

verses.content: بَلِ الْإِنسَانُ عَلَىٰ نَفْسِهِ بَصِيرَةٌ
verses.translation: Nay! Man will be a witness against himself [as his body parts (skin, hands, legs, etc.) will speak about his deeds].

verses.content: وَلَوْ أَلْقَىٰ مَعَاذِيرَهُ
verses.translation: Though he may put forth his excuses (to cover his evil deeds).

verses.content: لَا تُحَرِّكْ بِهِ لِسَانَكَ لِتَعْجَلَ بِهِ
verses.translation: Move not your tongue concerning (the Quran, O Muhammad SAW) to make haste therewith.

verses.content: إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا جَمْعَهُ وَقُرْآنَهُ
verses.translation: It is for Us to collect it and to give you (O Muhammad SAW) the ability to recite it (the Quran),

verses.content: فَإِذَا قَرَأْنَاهُ فَاتَّبِعْ قُرْآنَهُ
verses.translation: And when We have recited it to you [O Muhammad SAW through Jibrael (Gabriel)], then follow you its (the Quran's) recital.

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا بَيَانَهُ
verses.translation: Then it is for Us (Allah) to make it clear to you,

verses.content: كَلَّا بَلْ تُحِبُّونَ الْعَاجِلَةَ
verses.translation: Not [as you think, that you (mankind) will not be resurrected and recompensed for your deeds], but (you men) love the present life of this world,

verses.content: وَتَذَرُونَ الْآخِرَةَ
verses.translation: And leave (neglect) the Hereafter.

verses.content: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ نَّاضِرَةٌ
verses.translation: Some faces that Day shall be Nadirah (shining and radiant).

verses.content: إِلَىٰ رَبِّهَا نَاظِرَةٌ
verses.translation: Looking at their Lord (Allah);

verses.content: وَوُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ بَاسِرَةٌ
verses.translation: And some faces, that Day, will be Basirah (dark, gloomy, frowning, and sad),

verses.content: تَظُنُّ أَن يُفْعَلَ بِهَا فَاقِرَةٌ
verses.translation: Thinking that some calamity was about to fall on them;

verses.content: كَلَّا إِذَا بَلَغَتِ التَّرَاقِيَ
verses.translation: Nay, when (the soul) reaches to the collar bone (i.e. up to the throat in its exit),

verses.content: وَقِيلَ مَنْ ۜ رَاقٍ
verses.translation: And it will be said: "Who can cure him and save him from death?"

verses.content: وَظَنَّ أَنَّهُ الْفِرَاقُ
verses.translation: And he (the dying person) will conclude that it was (the time) of departing (death);

verses.content: وَالْتَفَّتِ السَّاقُ بِالسَّاقِ
verses.translation: And leg will be joined with another leg (shrouded)

verses.content: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ الْمَسَاقُ
verses.translation: The drive will be, on that Day, to your Lord (Allah)!

verses.content: فَلَا صَدَّقَ وَلَا صَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: So he (the disbeliever) neither believed (in this Quran, in the Message of Muhammad SAW) nor prayed!

verses.content: وَلَـٰكِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: But on the contrary, he belied (this Quran and the Message of Muhammad SAW) and turned away!

verses.content: ثُمَّ ذَهَبَ إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِ يَتَمَطَّىٰ
verses.translation: Then he walked in full pride to his family admiring himself!

verses.content: أَوْلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوْلَىٰ
verses.translation: Woe to you [O man (disbeliever)]! And then (again) woe to you!

verses.content: ثُمَّ أَوْلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوْلَىٰ
verses.translation: Again, woe to you [O man (disbeliever)]! And then (again) woe to you!

verses.content: أَيَحْسَبُ الْإِنسَانُ أَن يُتْرَكَ سُدًى
verses.translation: Does man think that he will be left Suda [neglected without being punished or rewarded for the obligatory duties enjoined by his Lord (Allah) on him]?

verses.content: أَلَمْ يَكُ نُطْفَةً مِّن مَّنِيٍّ يُمْنَىٰ
verses.translation: Was he not a Nutfah (mixed male and female discharge of semen) poured forth?

verses.content: ثُمَّ كَانَ عَلَقَةً فَخَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ
verses.translation: Then he became an 'Alaqa (a clot); then (Allah) shaped and fashioned (him) in due proportion.

verses.content: فَجَعَلَ مِنْهُ الزَّوْجَيْنِ الذَّكَرَ وَالْأُنثَىٰ
verses.translation: And made him in two sexes, male and female.

verses.content: أَلَيْسَ ذَٰلِكَ بِقَادِرٍ عَلَىٰ أَن يُحْيِيَ الْمَوْتَىٰ
verses.translation: Is not He (Allah Who does that), Able to give life to the dead? (Yes! He is Able to do all things).

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ هَلْ أَتَىٰ عَلَى الْإِنسَانِ حِينٌ مِّنَ الدَّهْرِ لَمْ يَكُن شَيْئًا مَّذْكُورًا
verses.translation: Has there not been over man a period of time, when he was nothing to be mentioned?

verses.content: إِنَّا خَلَقْنَا الْإِنسَانَ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ أَمْشَاجٍ نَّبْتَلِيهِ فَجَعَلْنَاهُ سَمِيعًا بَصِيرًا
verses.translation: Verily, We have created man from Nutfah drops of mixed semen (discharge of man and woman), in order to try him, so We made him hearer, seer.

verses.content: إِنَّا هَدَيْنَاهُ السَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرًا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا
verses.translation: Verily, We showed him the way, whether he be grateful or ungrateful.

verses.content: إِنَّا أَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكَافِرِينَ سَلَاسِلَ وَأَغْلَالًا وَسَعِيرًا
verses.translation: Verily, We have prepared for the disbelievers iron chains, iron collars, and a blazing Fire.

verses.content: إِنَّ الْأَبْرَارَ يَشْرَبُونَ مِن كَأْسٍ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا
verses.translation: Verily, the Abrar (pious, who fear Allah and avoid evil), shall drink a cup (of wine) mixed with water from a spring in Paradise called Kafur.

verses.content: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ اللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفْجِيرًا
verses.translation: A spring wherefrom the slaves of Allah will drink, causing it to gush forth abundantly.

verses.content: يُوفُونَ بِالنَّذْرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوْمًا كَانَ شَرُّهُ مُسْتَطِيرًا
verses.translation: They (are those who) fulfill (their) vows, and they fear a Day whose evil will be wide-spreading.

verses.content: وَيُطْعِمُونَ الطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِ مِسْكِينًا وَيَتِيمًا وَأَسِيرًا
verses.translation: And they give food, inspite of their love for it (or for the love of Him), to Miskin (poor), the orphan, and the captive,

verses.content: إِنَّمَا نُطْعِمُكُمْ لِوَجْهِ اللَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنكُمْ جَزَاءً وَلَا شُكُورًا
verses.translation: (Saying): "We feed you seeking Allah's Countenance only. We wish for no reward, nor thanks from you.

verses.content: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوْمًا عَبُوسًا قَمْطَرِيرًا
verses.translation: "Verily, We fear from our Lord a Day, hard and distressful, that will make the faces look horrible (from extreme dislikeness to it)."

verses.content: فَوَقَاهُمُ اللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ الْيَوْمِ وَلَقَّاهُمْ نَضْرَةً وَسُرُورًا
verses.translation: So Allah saved them from the evil of that Day, and gave them Nadratan (a light of beauty) and joy.

verses.content: وَجَزَاهُم بِمَا صَبَرُوا جَنَّةً وَحَرِيرًا
verses.translation: And their recompense shall be Paradise, and silken garments, because they were patient.

verses.content: مُّتَّكِئِينَ فِيهَا عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ ۖ لَا يَرَوْنَ فِيهَا شَمْسًا وَلَا زَمْهَرِيرًا
verses.translation: Reclining therein on raised thrones, they will see there neither the excessive heat of the sun, nor the excessive bitter cold, (as in Paradise there is no sun and no moon).

verses.content: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيْهِمْ ظِلَالُهَا وَذُلِّلَتْ قُطُوفُهَا تَذْلِيلًا
verses.translation: And the shade thereof is close upon them, and the bunches of fruit thereof will hang low within their reach.

verses.content: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيْهِم بِآنِيَةٍ مِّن فِضَّةٍ وَأَكْوَابٍ كَانَتْ قَوَارِيرَا
verses.translation: And amongst them will be passed round vessels of silver and cups of crystal,

verses.content: قَوَارِيرَ مِن فِضَّةٍ قَدَّرُوهَا تَقْدِيرًا
verses.translation: Crystal-clear, made of silver. They will determine the measure thereof according to their wishes.

verses.content: وَيُسْقَوْنَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنجَبِيلًا
verses.translation: And they will be given to drink there a cup (of wine) mixed with Zanjabil (ginger, etc.),

verses.content: عَيْنًا فِيهَا تُسَمَّىٰ سَلْسَبِيلًا
verses.translation: A spring there, called Salsabil.

verses.content: وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ وِلْدَانٌ مُّخَلَّدُونَ إِذَا رَأَيْتَهُمْ حَسِبْتَهُمْ لُؤْلُؤًا مَّنثُورًا
verses.translation: And round about them will (serve) boys of everlasting youth. If you see them, you would think them scattered pearls.

verses.content: وَإِذَا رَأَيْتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيْتَ نَعِيمًا وَمُلْكًا كَبِيرًا
verses.translation: And when you look there (in Paradise), you will see a delight (that cannot be imagined), and a great dominion.

verses.content: عَالِيَهُمْ ثِيَابُ سُندُسٍ خُضْرٌ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٌ ۖ وَحُلُّوا أَسَاوِرَ مِن فِضَّةٍ وَسَقَاهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ شَرَابًا طَهُورًا
verses.translation: Their garments will be of fine green silk, and gold embroidery. They will be adorned with bracelets of silver, and their Lord will give them a pure drink.

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمْ جَزَاءً وَكَانَ سَعْيُكُم مَّشْكُورًا
verses.translation: (And it will be said to them): "Verily, this is a reward for you, and your endeavour has been accepted."

verses.content: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكَ الْقُرْآنَ تَنزِيلًا
verses.translation: Verily! It is We Who have sent down the Quran to you (O Muhammad SAW) by stages.

verses.content: فَاصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعْ مِنْهُمْ آثِمًا أَوْ كَفُورًا
verses.translation: Therefore be patient (O Muhammad SAW) and submit to the Command of your Lord (Allah, by doing your duty to Him and by conveying His Message to mankind), and obey neither a sinner nor a disbeliever among them.

verses.content: وَاذْكُرِ اسْمَ رَبِّكَ بُكْرَةً وَأَصِيلًا
verses.translation: And remember the Name of your Lord every morning and afternoon [i.e. offering of the Morning (Fajr), Zuhr, and 'Asr prayers].

verses.content: وَمِنَ اللَّيْلِ فَاسْجُدْ لَهُ وَسَبِّحْهُ لَيْلًا طَوِيلًا
verses.translation: And during night, prostrate yourself to Him (i.e. the offering of Maghrib and 'Isha' prayers), and glorify Him a long night through (i.e. Tahajjud prayer).

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰؤُلَاءِ يُحِبُّونَ الْعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَاءَهُمْ يَوْمًا ثَقِيلًا
verses.translation: Verily! These (disbelievers) love the present life of this world, and put behind them a heavy Day (that will be hard).

verses.content: نَّحْنُ خَلَقْنَاهُمْ وَشَدَدْنَا أَسْرَهُمْ ۖ وَإِذَا شِئْنَا بَدَّلْنَا أَمْثَالَهُمْ تَبْدِيلًا
verses.translation: It is We Who created them, and We have made them of strong built. And when We will, We can replace them with others like them with a complete replacement.

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذِهِ تَذْكِرَةٌ ۖ فَمَن شَاءَ اتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِ سَبِيلًا
verses.translation: Verily! This (Verses of the Quran) is an admonition, so whosoever wills, let him take a Path to his Lord (Allah).

verses.content: وَمَا تَشَاءُونَ إِلَّا أَن يَشَاءَ اللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا
verses.translation: But you cannot will, unless Allah wills. Verily, Allah is Ever All-Knowing, All-Wise.

verses.content: يُدْخِلُ مَن يَشَاءُ فِي رَحْمَتِهِ ۚ وَالظَّالِمِينَ أَعَدَّ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
verses.translation: He will admit to His Mercy whom He will and as for the Zalimun, (polytheists, wrong-doers, etc.) He has prepared a painful torment.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالْمُرْسَلَاتِ عُرْفًا
verses.translation: By the winds (or angels or the Messengers of Allah) sent forth one after another.

verses.content: فَالْعَاصِفَاتِ عَصْفًا
verses.translation: And by the winds that blow violently,

verses.content: وَالنَّاشِرَاتِ نَشْرًا
verses.translation: And by the winds that scatter clouds and rain;

verses.content: فَالْفَارِقَاتِ فَرْقًا
verses.translation: And by the Verses (of the Quran) that separate the right from the wrong.

verses.content: فَالْمُلْقِيَاتِ ذِكْرًا
verses.translation: And by the angels that bring the revelations to the Messengers,

verses.content: عُذْرًا أَوْ نُذْرًا
verses.translation: To cut off all excuses or to warn;

verses.content: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَوَاقِعٌ
verses.translation: Surely, what you are promised must come to pass.

verses.content: فَإِذَا النُّجُومُ طُمِسَتْ
verses.translation: Then when the stars lose their lights;

verses.content: وَإِذَا السَّمَاءُ فُرِجَتْ
verses.translation: And when the heaven is cleft asunder;

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْجِبَالُ نُسِفَتْ
verses.translation: And when the mountains are blown away;

verses.content: وَإِذَا الرُّسُلُ أُقِّتَتْ
verses.translation: And when the Messengers are gathered to their time appointed;

verses.content: لِأَيِّ يَوْمٍ أُجِّلَتْ
verses.translation: For what Day are these signs postponed?

verses.content: لِيَوْمِ الْفَصْلِ
verses.translation: For the Day of sorting out (the men of Paradise from the men destined for Hell).

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا يَوْمُ الْفَصْلِ
verses.translation: And what will explain to you what is the Day of sorting out?

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe that Day to the deniers (of the Day of Resurrection)!

verses.content: أَلَمْ نُهْلِكِ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: Did We not destroy the ancients?

verses.content: ثُمَّ نُتْبِعُهُمُ الْآخِرِينَ
verses.translation: So shall We make later generations to follow them.

verses.content: كَذَٰلِكَ نَفْعَلُ بِالْمُجْرِمِينَ
verses.translation: Thus do We deal with the Mujrimun (polytheists, disbelievers, sinners, criminals, etc.)!

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe that Day to the deniers (of the Day of Resurrection)!

verses.content: أَلَمْ نَخْلُقكُّم مِّن مَّاءٍ مَّهِينٍ
verses.translation: Did We not create you from a worthless water (semen, etc.)?

verses.content: فَجَعَلْنَاهُ فِي قَرَارٍ مَّكِينٍ
verses.translation: Then We placed it in a place of safety (womb),

verses.content: إِلَىٰ قَدَرٍ مَّعْلُومٍ
verses.translation: For a known period (determined by gestation)?

verses.content: فَقَدَرْنَا فَنِعْمَ الْقَادِرُونَ
verses.translation: So We did measure, and We are the Best to measure (the things).

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe that Day to the deniers (of the Day of Resurrection)!

verses.content: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ الْأَرْضَ كِفَاتًا
verses.translation: Have We not made the earth a receptacle?

verses.content: أَحْيَاءً وَأَمْوَاتًا
verses.translation: For the living and the dead.

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا رَوَاسِيَ شَامِخَاتٍ وَأَسْقَيْنَاكُم مَّاءً فُرَاتًا
verses.translation: And have placed therein firm, and tall mountains; and have given you to drink sweet water?

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe that Day to the deniers (of the Day of Resurrection)!

verses.content: انطَلِقُوا إِلَىٰ مَا كُنتُم بِهِ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: (It will be said to the disbelievers): "Depart you to that which you used to deny!

verses.content: انطَلِقُوا إِلَىٰ ظِلٍّ ذِي ثَلَاثِ شُعَبٍ
verses.translation: "Depart you to a shadow (of Hell-fire smoke ascending) in three columns,

verses.content: لَّا ظَلِيلٍ وَلَا يُغْنِي مِنَ اللَّهَبِ
verses.translation: "Neither shading, nor of any use against the fierce flame of the Fire."

verses.content: إِنَّهَا تَرْمِي بِشَرَرٍ كَالْقَصْرِ
verses.translation: Verily! It (Hell) throws sparks (huge) as Al-Qasr [a fort or a Qasr (huge log of wood)],

verses.content: كَأَنَّهُ جِمَالَتٌ صُفْرٌ
verses.translation: As if they were Jimalatun Sufr (yellow camels or bundles of ropes)."

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe that Day to the deniers (of the Day of Resurrection)!

verses.content: هَـٰذَا يَوْمُ لَا يَنطِقُونَ
verses.translation: That will be a Day when they shall not speak (during some part of it),

verses.content: وَلَا يُؤْذَنُ لَهُمْ فَيَعْتَذِرُونَ
verses.translation: And they will not be permitted to put forth any excuse.

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe that Day to the deniers (of the Day of Resurrection)!

verses.content: هَـٰذَا يَوْمُ الْفَصْلِ ۖ جَمَعْنَاكُمْ وَالْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: That will be a Day of Decision! We have brought you and the men of old together!

verses.content: فَإِن كَانَ لَكُمْ كَيْدٌ فَكِيدُونِ
verses.translation: So if you have a plot, use it against Me (Allah)!

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe that Day to the deniers (of the Day of Resurrection)!

verses.content: إِنَّ الْمُتَّقِينَ فِي ظِلَالٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.translation: Verily, the Muttaqun (pious - see V. 2:2) shall be amidst shades and springs.

verses.content: وَفَوَاكِهَ مِمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ
verses.translation: And fruits, such as they desire.

verses.content: كُلُوا وَاشْرَبُوا هَنِيئًا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: "Eat and drink comfortably for that which you used to do.

verses.content: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: Verily, thus We reward the Muhsinun (good-doers).

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe that Day to the deniers (of the Day of Resurrection)!

verses.content: كُلُوا وَتَمَتَّعُوا قَلِيلًا إِنَّكُم مُّجْرِمُونَ
verses.translation: (O you disbelievers)! Eat and enjoy yourselves (in this worldly life) for a little while. Verily, you are the Mujrimun (polytheists, disbelievers, sinners, criminals, etc.).

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe that Day to the deniers (of the Day of Resurrection)!

verses.content: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ارْكَعُوا لَا يَرْكَعُونَ
verses.translation: And when it is said to them: "Bow down yourself (in prayer)!" They bow not down (offer not their prayers).

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe that Day to the deniers (of the Day of Resurrection)!

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ حَدِيثٍ بَعْدَهُ يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: Then in what statement after this (the Quran) will they believe?

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ عَمَّ يَتَسَاءَلُونَ
verses.translation: What are they asking (one another)?

verses.content: عَنِ النَّبَإِ الْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: About the great news, (i.e. Islamic Monotheism, the Quran, which Prophet Muhammad (Peace be upon him) brought and the Day of Resurrection, etc.),

verses.content: الَّذِي هُمْ فِيهِ مُخْتَلِفُونَ
verses.translation: About which they are in disagreement.

verses.content: كَلَّا سَيَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Nay, they will come to know!

verses.content: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَيَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Nay, again, they will come to know!

verses.content: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ الْأَرْضَ مِهَادًا
verses.translation: Have We not made the earth as a bed,

verses.content: وَالْجِبَالَ أَوْتَادًا
verses.translation: And the mountains as pegs?

verses.content: وَخَلَقْنَاكُمْ أَزْوَاجًا
verses.translation: And We have created you in pairs (male and female, tall and short, good and bad, etc.).

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا نَوْمَكُمْ سُبَاتًا
verses.translation: And have made your sleep as a thing for rest.

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا اللَّيْلَ لِبَاسًا
verses.translation: And have made the night as a covering (through its darkness),

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا النَّهَارَ مَعَاشًا
verses.translation: And have made the day for livelihood.

verses.content: وَبَنَيْنَا فَوْقَكُمْ سَبْعًا شِدَادًا
verses.translation: And We have built above you seven strong (heavens),

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا سِرَاجًا وَهَّاجًا
verses.translation: And have made (therein) a shinning lamp (sun).

verses.content: وَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ الْمُعْصِرَاتِ مَاءً ثَجَّاجًا
verses.translation: And have sent down from the rainy clouds abundant water.

verses.content: لِّنُخْرِجَ بِهِ حَبًّا وَنَبَاتًا
verses.translation: That We may produce therewith corn and vegetations,

verses.content: وَجَنَّاتٍ أَلْفَافًا
verses.translation: And gardens of thick growth.

verses.content: إِنَّ يَوْمَ الْفَصْلِ كَانَ مِيقَاتًا
verses.translation: Verily, the Day of Decision is a fixed time,

verses.content: يَوْمَ يُنفَخُ فِي الصُّورِ فَتَأْتُونَ أَفْوَاجًا
verses.translation: The Day when the Trumpet will be blown, and you shall come forth in crowds (groups);

verses.content: وَفُتِحَتِ السَّمَاءُ فَكَانَتْ أَبْوَابًا
verses.translation: And the heaven shall be opened, and it will become as gates,

verses.content: وَسُيِّرَتِ الْجِبَالُ فَكَانَتْ سَرَابًا
verses.translation: And the mountains shall be moved away from their places and they will be as if they were a mirage.

verses.content: إِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ كَانَتْ مِرْصَادًا
verses.translation: Truly, Hell is a place of ambush,

verses.content: لِّلطَّاغِينَ مَآبًا
verses.translation: A dwelling place for the Taghun (those who transgress the boundry limits set by Allah like polytheists, disbelievers in the Oneness of Allah, hyprocrites, sinners, criminals, etc.),

verses.content: لَّابِثِينَ فِيهَا أَحْقَابًا
verses.translation: They will abide therein for ages,

verses.content: لَّا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرْدًا وَلَا شَرَابًا
verses.translation: Nothing cool shall they taste therein, nor any drink.

verses.content: إِلَّا حَمِيمًا وَغَسَّاقًا
verses.translation: Except boiling water, and dirty wound discharges.

verses.content: جَزَاءً وِفَاقًا
verses.translation: An exact recompense (according to their evil crimes).

verses.content: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا لَا يَرْجُونَ حِسَابًا
verses.translation: For verily, they used not to look for a reckoning.

verses.content: وَكَذَّبُوا بِآيَاتِنَا كِذَّابًا
verses.translation: But they belied Our Ayat (proofs, evidences, verses, lessons, signs, revelations, and that which Our Prophet (Peace be upon him) brought) completely.

verses.content: وَكُلَّ شَيْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَاهُ كِتَابًا
verses.translation: And all things We have recorded in a Book.

verses.content: فَذُوقُوا فَلَن نَّزِيدَكُمْ إِلَّا عَذَابًا
verses.translation: So taste you (the results of your evil actions); no increase shall We give you, except in torment.

verses.content: إِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ مَفَازًا
verses.translation: Verily, for the Muttaqun, there will be a success (Paradise);

verses.content: حَدَائِقَ وَأَعْنَابًا
verses.translation: Gardens and grapeyards;

verses.content: وَكَوَاعِبَ أَتْرَابًا
verses.translation: And young full-breasted (mature) maidens of equal age;

verses.content: وَكَأْسًا دِهَاقًا
verses.translation: And a full cup (of wine).

verses.content: لَّا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْوًا وَلَا كِذَّابًا
verses.translation: No Laghw (dirty, false, evil talk) shall they hear therein, nor lying;

verses.content: جَزَاءً مِّن رَّبِّكَ عَطَاءً حِسَابًا
verses.translation: A reward from your Lord, an ample calculated gift (according to the best of their good deeds).

verses.content: رَّبِّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا الرَّحْمَـٰنِ ۖ لَا يَمْلِكُونَ مِنْهُ خِطَابًا
verses.translation: (From) the Lord of the heavens and the earth, and whatsoever is in between them, the Most Beneficent, none can dare to speak with Him (on the Day of Resurrection except after His Leave).

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ الرُّوحُ وَالْمَلَائِكَةُ صَفًّا ۖ لَّا يَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنْ أَذِنَ لَهُ الرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَقَالَ صَوَابًا
verses.translation: The Day that Ar-Ruh [Jibrael (Gabriel) or another angel] and the angels will stand forth in rows, none shall speak except him whom the Most Beneficent (Allah) allows, and he will speak what is right.

verses.content: ذَٰلِكَ الْيَوْمُ الْحَقُّ ۖ فَمَن شَاءَ اتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِ مَآبًا
verses.translation: That is without doubt the True Day, so, whosoever wills, let him seek a place with (or a way to) His Lord (by obeying Him in this worldly life)!

verses.content: إِنَّا أَنذَرْنَاكُمْ عَذَابًا قَرِيبًا يَوْمَ يَنظُرُ الْمَرْءُ مَا قَدَّمَتْ يَدَاهُ وَيَقُولُ الْكَافِرُ يَا لَيْتَنِي كُنتُ تُرَابًا
verses.translation: Verily, We have warned you of a near torment, the Day when man will see that (the deeds) which his hands have sent forth, and the disbeliever will say: "Woe to me! Would that I were dust!"

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالنَّازِعَاتِ غَرْقًا
verses.translation: By those (angels) who pull out (the souls of the disbelievers and the wicked) with great violence;

verses.content: وَالنَّاشِطَاتِ نَشْطًا
verses.translation: By those (angels) who gently take out (the souls of the believers);

verses.content: وَالسَّابِحَاتِ سَبْحًا
verses.translation: And by those that swim along (i.e. angels or planets in their orbits, etc.).

verses.content: فَالسَّابِقَاتِ سَبْقًا
verses.translation: And by those that press forward as in a race (i.e. the angels or stars or the horses, etc.).

verses.content: فَالْمُدَبِّرَاتِ أَمْرًا
verses.translation: And by those angels who arrange to do the Commands of their Lord, (so verily, you disbelievers will be called to account).

verses.content: يَوْمَ تَرْجُفُ الرَّاجِفَةُ
verses.translation: On the Day (when the first blowing of the Trumpet is blown), the earth and the mountains will shake violently (and everybody will die),

verses.content: تَتْبَعُهَا الرَّادِفَةُ
verses.translation: The second blowing of the Trumpet follows it (and everybody will be raised up),

verses.content: قُلُوبٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ وَاجِفَةٌ
verses.translation: (Some) hearts that Day will shake with fear and anxiety.

verses.content: أَبْصَارُهَا خَاشِعَةٌ
verses.translation: Their eyes cast down.

verses.content: يَقُولُونَ أَإِنَّا لَمَرْدُودُونَ فِي الْحَافِرَةِ
verses.translation: They say: "Shall we indeed be returned to (our) former state of life?

verses.content: أَإِذَا كُنَّا عِظَامًا نَّخِرَةً
verses.translation: "Even after we are crumbled bones?"

verses.content: قَالُوا تِلْكَ إِذًا كَرَّةٌ خَاسِرَةٌ
verses.translation: They say: "It would in that case, be a return with loss!"

verses.content: فَإِنَّمَا هِيَ زَجْرَةٌ وَاحِدَةٌ
verses.translation: But only, it will be a single Zajrah [shout (i.e., the second blowing of the Trumpet)]. (See Verse 37:19).

verses.content: فَإِذَا هُم بِالسَّاهِرَةِ
verses.translation: When, behold, they find themselves over the earth alive after their death,

verses.content: هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ مُوسَىٰ
verses.translation: Has there come to you the story of Musa (Moses)?

verses.content: إِذْ نَادَاهُ رَبُّهُ بِالْوَادِ الْمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى
verses.translation: When his Lord called him in the sacred valley of Tuwa,

verses.content: اذْهَبْ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّهُ طَغَىٰ
verses.translation: Go to Fir'aun (Pharaoh), verily, he has transgressed all bounds (in crimes, sins, polytheism, disbelief, etc.).

verses.content: فَقُلْ هَل لَّكَ إِلَىٰ أَن تَزَكَّىٰ
verses.translation: And say to him: "Would you purify yourself (from the sin of disbelief by becoming a believer)",

verses.content: وَأَهْدِيَكَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَتَخْشَىٰ
verses.translation: And that I guide you to your Lord, so you should fear Him?

verses.content: فَأَرَاهُ الْآيَةَ الْكُبْرَىٰ
verses.translation: Then [Musa (Moses)] showed him the great sign (miracles).

verses.content: فَكَذَّبَ وَعَصَىٰ
verses.translation: But [Fir'aun (Pharaoh)] belied and disobeyed;

verses.content: ثُمَّ أَدْبَرَ يَسْعَىٰ
verses.translation: Then he turned his back, striving hard (against Allah).

verses.content: فَحَشَرَ فَنَادَىٰ
verses.translation: Then he gathered his people and cried aloud,

verses.content: فَقَالَ أَنَا رَبُّكُمُ الْأَعْلَىٰ
verses.translation: Saying: "I am your lord, most high",

verses.content: فَأَخَذَهُ اللَّهُ نَكَالَ الْآخِرَةِ وَالْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: So Allah, seized him with punishment for his last [i.e. his saying: "I am your lord, most high") (see Verse 79:24)] and first [(i.e. his saying, "O chiefs! I know not that you have a god other than I" (see Verse 28:38)] transgression.

verses.content: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبْرَةً لِّمَن يَخْشَىٰ
verses.translation: Verily, in this is an instructive admonition for whosoever fears Allah.

verses.content: أَأَنتُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَمِ السَّمَاءُ ۚ بَنَاهَا
verses.translation: Are you more difficult to create, or is the heaven that He constructed?

verses.content: رَفَعَ سَمْكَهَا فَسَوَّاهَا
verses.translation: He raised its height, and He has equally ordered it,

verses.content: وَأَغْطَشَ لَيْلَهَا وَأَخْرَجَ ضُحَاهَا
verses.translation: Its night He covers with darkness, and its forenoon He brings out (with light).

verses.content: وَالْأَرْضَ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ دَحَاهَا
verses.translation: And after that He spread the earth;

verses.content: أَخْرَجَ مِنْهَا مَاءَهَا وَمَرْعَاهَا
verses.translation: And brought forth therefrom its water and its pasture;

verses.content: وَالْجِبَالَ أَرْسَاهَا
verses.translation: And the mountains He has fixed firmly;

verses.content: مَتَاعًا لَّكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَامِكُمْ
verses.translation: (To be) a provision and benefit for you and your cattle.

verses.content: فَإِذَا جَاءَتِ الطَّامَّةُ الْكُبْرَىٰ
verses.translation: But when there comes the greatest catastrophe (i.e. the Day of Recompense, etc.),

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَتَذَكَّرُ الْإِنسَانُ مَا سَعَىٰ
verses.translation: The Day when man shall remember what he strove for,

verses.content: وَبُرِّزَتِ الْجَحِيمُ لِمَن يَرَىٰ
verses.translation: And Hell-fire shall be made apparent in full view for (every) one who sees,

verses.content: فَأَمَّا مَن طَغَىٰ
verses.translation: Then, for him who Tagha (transgressed all bounds, in disbelief, oppression and evil deeds of disobedience to Allah).

verses.content: وَآثَرَ الْحَيَاةَ الدُّنْيَا
verses.translation: And preferred the life of this world (by following his evil desires and lusts),

verses.content: فَإِنَّ الْجَحِيمَ هِيَ الْمَأْوَىٰ
verses.translation: Verily, his abode will be Hell-fire;

verses.content: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِ وَنَهَى النَّفْسَ عَنِ الْهَوَىٰ
verses.translation: But as for him who feared standing before his Lord, and restrained himself from impure evil desires, and lusts.

verses.content: فَإِنَّ الْجَنَّةَ هِيَ الْمَأْوَىٰ
verses.translation: Verily, Paradise will be his abode.

verses.content: يَسْأَلُونَكَ عَنِ السَّاعَةِ أَيَّانَ مُرْسَاهَا
verses.translation: They ask you (O Muhammad (Peace be upon him)) about the Hour, - when will be its appointed time?

verses.content: فِيمَ أَنتَ مِن ذِكْرَاهَا
verses.translation: You have no knowledge to say anything about it,

verses.content: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ مُنتَهَاهَا
verses.translation: To your Lord belongs (the knowledge of) the term thereof?

verses.content: إِنَّمَا أَنتَ مُنذِرُ مَن يَخْشَاهَا
verses.translation: You (O Muhammad (Peace be upon him)) are only a warner for those who fear it,

verses.content: كَأَنَّهُمْ يَوْمَ يَرَوْنَهَا لَمْ يَلْبَثُوا إِلَّا عَشِيَّةً أَوْ ضُحَاهَا
verses.translation: The Day they see it, (it will be) as if they had not tarried (in this world) except an afternoon or a morning.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ عَبَسَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: (The Prophet (Peace be upon him)) frowned and turned away,

verses.content: أَن جَاءَهُ الْأَعْمَىٰ
verses.translation: Because there came to him the blind man (i.e. 'Abdullah bin Umm-Maktum, who came to the Prophet (Peace be upon him) while he was preaching to one or some of the Quraish chiefs).

verses.content: وَمَا يُدْرِيكَ لَعَلَّهُ يَزَّكَّىٰ
verses.translation: But what could tell you that per chance he might become pure (from sins)?

verses.content: أَوْ يَذَّكَّرُ فَتَنفَعَهُ الذِّكْرَىٰ
verses.translation: Or that he might receive admonition, and that the admonition might profit him?

verses.content: أَمَّا مَنِ اسْتَغْنَىٰ
verses.translation: As for him who thinks himself self-sufficient,

verses.content: فَأَنتَ لَهُ تَصَدَّىٰ
verses.translation: To him you attend;

verses.content: وَمَا عَلَيْكَ أَلَّا يَزَّكَّىٰ
verses.translation: What does it matter to you if he will not become pure (from disbelief, you are only a Messenger, your duty is to convey the Message of Allah).

verses.content: وَأَمَّا مَن جَاءَكَ يَسْعَىٰ
verses.translation: But as to him who came to you running.

verses.content: وَهُوَ يَخْشَىٰ
verses.translation: And is afraid (of Allah and His Punishment),

verses.content: فَأَنتَ عَنْهُ تَلَهَّىٰ
verses.translation: Of him you are neglectful and divert your attention to another,

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّهَا تَذْكِرَةٌ
verses.translation: Nay, (do not do like this), indeed it (these Verses of this Quran) are an admonition,

verses.content: فَمَن شَاءَ ذَكَرَهُ
verses.translation: So whoever wills, let him pay attention to it.

verses.content: فِي صُحُفٍ مُّكَرَّمَةٍ
verses.translation: (It is) in Records held (greatly) in honour (Al-Lauh Al-Mahfuz).

verses.content: مَّرْفُوعَةٍ مُّطَهَّرَةٍ
verses.translation: Exalted (in dignity), purified,

verses.content: بِأَيْدِي سَفَرَةٍ
verses.translation: In the hands of scribes (angels).

verses.content: كِرَامٍ بَرَرَةٍ
verses.translation: Honourable and obedient.

verses.content: قُتِلَ الْإِنسَانُ مَا أَكْفَرَهُ
verses.translation: Be cursed (the disbelieving) man! How ungrateful he is!

verses.content: مِنْ أَيِّ شَيْءٍ خَلَقَهُ
verses.translation: From what thing did He create him?

verses.content: مِن نُّطْفَةٍ خَلَقَهُ فَقَدَّرَهُ
verses.translation: From Nutfah (male and female semen drops) He created him, and then set him in due proportion;

verses.content: ثُمَّ السَّبِيلَ يَسَّرَهُ
verses.translation: Then He makes the Path easy for him;

verses.content: ثُمَّ أَمَاتَهُ فَأَقْبَرَهُ
verses.translation: Then He causes him to die, and puts him in his grave;

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِذَا شَاءَ أَنشَرَهُ
verses.translation: Then, when it is His Will, He will resurrect him (again).

verses.content: كَلَّا لَمَّا يَقْضِ مَا أَمَرَهُ
verses.translation: Nay, but (man) has not done what He commanded him.

verses.content: فَلْيَنظُرِ الْإِنسَانُ إِلَىٰ طَعَامِهِ
verses.translation: Then let man look at his food,

verses.content: أَنَّا صَبَبْنَا الْمَاءَ صَبًّا
verses.translation: That We pour forth water in abundance,

verses.content: ثُمَّ شَقَقْنَا الْأَرْضَ شَقًّا
verses.translation: And We split the earth in clefts,

verses.content: فَأَنبَتْنَا فِيهَا حَبًّا
verses.translation: And We cause therein the grain to grow,

verses.content: وَعِنَبًا وَقَضْبًا
verses.translation: And grapes and clover plants (i.e. green fodder for the cattle),

verses.content: وَزَيْتُونًا وَنَخْلًا
verses.translation: And olives and date-palms,

verses.content: وَحَدَائِقَ غُلْبًا
verses.translation: And gardens, dense with many trees,

verses.content: وَفَاكِهَةً وَأَبًّا
verses.translation: And fruits and Abba (herbage, etc.),

verses.content: مَّتَاعًا لَّكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَامِكُمْ
verses.translation: (To be) a provision and benefit for you and your cattle.

verses.content: فَإِذَا جَاءَتِ الصَّاخَّةُ
verses.translation: Then, when there comes As-Sakhkhah (the Day of Resurrection's second blowing of Trumpet),

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَفِرُّ الْمَرْءُ مِنْ أَخِيهِ
verses.translation: That Day shall a man flee from his brother,

verses.content: وَأُمِّهِ وَأَبِيهِ
verses.translation: And from his mother and his father,

verses.content: وَصَاحِبَتِهِ وَبَنِيهِ
verses.translation: And from his wife and his children.

verses.content: لِكُلِّ امْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ شَأْنٌ يُغْنِيهِ
verses.translation: Everyman, that Day, will have enough to make him careless of others.

verses.content: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ مُّسْفِرَةٌ
verses.translation: Some faces that Day, will be bright (true believers of Islamic Monotheism).

verses.content: ضَاحِكَةٌ مُّسْتَبْشِرَةٌ
verses.translation: Laughing, rejoicing at good news (of Paradise).

verses.content: وَوُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَلَيْهَا غَبَرَةٌ
verses.translation: And other faces, that Day, will be dust-stained;

verses.content: تَرْهَقُهَا قَتَرَةٌ
verses.translation: Darkness will cover them,

verses.content: أُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الْكَفَرَةُ الْفَجَرَةُ
verses.translation: Such will be the Kafarah (disbelievers in Allah, in His Oneness, and in His Messenger Muhammad (Peace be upon him), etc.), the Fajarah (wicked evil doers).

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا الشَّمْسُ كُوِّرَتْ
verses.translation: When the sun Kuwwirat (wound round and lost its light and is overthrown).

verses.content: وَإِذَا النُّجُومُ انكَدَرَتْ
verses.translation: And when the stars shall fall;

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْجِبَالُ سُيِّرَتْ
verses.translation: And when the mountains shall made to pass away;

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْعِشَارُ عُطِّلَتْ
verses.translation: And when the pregnant she-camels shall be neglected;

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْوُحُوشُ حُشِرَتْ
verses.translation: And when the wild beasts shall be gathered together;

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْبِحَارُ سُجِّرَتْ
verses.translation: And when the seas shall become as blazing Fire or shall overflow;

verses.content: وَإِذَا النُّفُوسُ زُوِّجَتْ
verses.translation: And when the souls shall be joined with their bodies;

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْمَوْءُودَةُ سُئِلَتْ
verses.translation: And when the female (infant) buried alive (as the pagan Arabs used to do) shall be questioned.

verses.content: بِأَيِّ ذَنبٍ قُتِلَتْ
verses.translation: For what sin she was killed?

verses.content: وَإِذَا الصُّحُفُ نُشِرَتْ
verses.translation: And when the written pages of deeds (good and bad) of every person shall be laid open;

verses.content: وَإِذَا السَّمَاءُ كُشِطَتْ
verses.translation: And when the heaven shall be stripped off and taken away from its place;

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْجَحِيمُ سُعِّرَتْ
verses.translation: And when Hell-fire shall be kindled to fierce ablaze.

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْجَنَّةُ أُزْلِفَتْ
verses.translation: And when Paradise shall be brought near,

verses.content: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌ مَّا أَحْضَرَتْ
verses.translation: (Then) every person will know what he has brought (of good and evil).

verses.content: فَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِالْخُنَّسِ
verses.translation: So verily, I swear by the planets that recede (i.e. disappear during the day and appear during the night).

verses.content: الْجَوَارِ الْكُنَّسِ
verses.translation: And by the planets that move swiftly and hide themselves,

verses.content: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا عَسْعَسَ
verses.translation: And by the night as it departs;

verses.content: وَالصُّبْحِ إِذَا تَنَفَّسَ
verses.translation: And by the dawn as it brightens;

verses.content: إِنَّهُ لَقَوْلُ رَسُولٍ كَرِيمٍ
verses.translation: Verily, this is the Word (this Quran brought by) a most honourable messenger [Jibrael (Gabriel), from Allah to the Prophet Muhammad (Peace be upon him)].

verses.content: ذِي قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِي الْعَرْشِ مَكِينٍ
verses.translation: Owner of power, and high rank with (Allah) the Lord of the Throne,

verses.content: مُّطَاعٍ ثَمَّ أَمِينٍ
verses.translation: Obeyed (by the angels), trustworthy there (in the heavens).

verses.content: وَمَا صَاحِبُكُم بِمَجْنُونٍ
verses.translation: And (O people) your companion (Muhammad (Peace be upon him)) is not a madman;

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ رَآهُ بِالْأُفُقِ الْمُبِينِ
verses.translation: And indeed he (Muhammad (Peace be upon him)) saw him [Jibrael (Gabriel)] in the clear horizon (towards the east).

verses.content: وَمَا هُوَ عَلَى الْغَيْبِ بِضَنِينٍ
verses.translation: And he (Muhammad (Peace be upon him)) withholds not a knowledge of the unseen.

verses.content: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوْلِ شَيْطَانٍ رَّجِيمٍ
verses.translation: And it (the Quran) is not the word of the outcast Shaitan (Satan).

verses.content: فَأَيْنَ تَذْهَبُونَ
verses.translation: Then where are you going?

verses.content: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ لِّلْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: Verily, this (the Quran) is no less than a Reminder to (all) the 'Alamin (mankind and jinns).

verses.content: لِمَن شَاءَ مِنكُمْ أَن يَسْتَقِيمَ
verses.translation: To whomsoever among you who wills to walk straight,

verses.content: وَمَا تَشَاءُونَ إِلَّا أَن يَشَاءَ اللَّهُ رَبُّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: And you will not, unless (it be) that Allah wills, the Lord of the 'Alamin (mankind, jinns and all that exists).

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا السَّمَاءُ انفَطَرَتْ
verses.translation: When the heaven is cleft asunder.

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْكَوَاكِبُ انتَثَرَتْ
verses.translation: And when the stars have fallen and scattered;

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْبِحَارُ فُجِّرَتْ
verses.translation: And when the seas are burst forth (got dried up);

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْقُبُورُ بُعْثِرَتْ
verses.translation: And when the graves are turned upside down (and they bring out their contents)

verses.content: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌ مَّا قَدَّمَتْ وَأَخَّرَتْ
verses.translation: (Then) a person will know what he has sent forward and (what he has) left behind (of good or bad deeds).

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا الْإِنسَانُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ الْكَرِيمِ
verses.translation: O man! What has made you careless concerning your Lord, the Most Generous?

verses.content: الَّذِي خَلَقَكَ فَسَوَّاكَ فَعَدَلَكَ
verses.translation: Who created you, fashioned you perfectly, and gave you due proportion;

verses.content: فِي أَيِّ صُورَةٍ مَّا شَاءَ رَكَّبَكَ
verses.translation: In whatever form He willed, He put you together.

verses.content: كَلَّا بَلْ تُكَذِّبُونَ بِالدِّينِ
verses.translation: Nay! But you deny the Recompense (reward for good deeds and punishment for evil deeds).

verses.content: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكُمْ لَحَافِظِينَ
verses.translation: But verily, over you (are appointed angels in charge of mankind) to watch you.

verses.content: كِرَامًا كَاتِبِينَ
verses.translation: Kiraman (honourable) Katibin writing down (your deeds).

verses.content: يَعْلَمُونَ مَا تَفْعَلُونَ
verses.translation: They know all that you do.

verses.content: إِنَّ الْأَبْرَارَ لَفِي نَعِيمٍ
verses.translation: Verily, the Abrar (pious and righteous) will be in delight (Paradise);

verses.content: وَإِنَّ الْفُجَّارَ لَفِي جَحِيمٍ
verses.translation: And verily, the Fujjar (the wicked, disbelievers, sinners and evil-doers) will be in the blazing Fire (Hell),

verses.content: يَصْلَوْنَهَا يَوْمَ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: In which they will enter, and taste its burning flame on the Day of Recompense,

verses.content: وَمَا هُمْ عَنْهَا بِغَائِبِينَ
verses.translation: And they (Al-Fujjar) will not be absent therefrom (i.e. will not go out from the Hell).

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا يَوْمُ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: And what will make you know what the Day of Recompense is?

verses.content: ثُمَّ مَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا يَوْمُ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: Again, what will make you know what the Day of Recompense is?

verses.content: يَوْمَ لَا تَمْلِكُ نَفْسٌ لِّنَفْسٍ شَيْئًا ۖ وَالْأَمْرُ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلَّهِ
verses.translation: (It will be) the Day when no person shall have power (to do) anything for another, and the Decision, that Day, will be (wholly) with Allah.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَيْلٌ لِّلْمُطَفِّفِينَ
verses.translation: Woe to Al-Mutaffifin [those who give less in measure and weight (decrease the rights of others)],

verses.content: الَّذِينَ إِذَا اكْتَالُوا عَلَى النَّاسِ يَسْتَوْفُونَ
verses.translation: Those who, when they have to receive by measure from men, demand full measure,

verses.content: وَإِذَا كَالُوهُمْ أَو وَّزَنُوهُمْ يُخْسِرُونَ
verses.translation: And when they have to give by measure or weight to men, give less than due.

verses.content: أَلَا يَظُنُّ أُولَـٰئِكَ أَنَّهُم مَّبْعُوثُونَ
verses.translation: Think they not that they will be resurrected (for reckoning),

verses.content: لِيَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
verses.translation: On a Great Day,

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ النَّاسُ لِرَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: The Day when (all) mankind will stand before the Lord of the 'Alamin (mankind, jinns and all that exists)?

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّ كِتَابَ الْفُجَّارِ لَفِي سِجِّينٍ
verses.translation: Nay! Truly, the Record (writing of the deeds) of the Fujjar (disbelievers, sinners, evil-doers and wicked) is (preserved) in Sijjin.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا سِجِّينٌ
verses.translation: And what will make you know what Sijjin is?

verses.content: كِتَابٌ مَّرْقُومٌ
verses.translation: A Register inscribed.

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe, that Day, to those who deny [(Allah, His Angels, His Books, His Messengers, the Day of Resurrection, and Al-Qadar (Divine Preordainments)].

verses.content: الَّذِينَ يُكَذِّبُونَ بِيَوْمِ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: Those who deny the Day of Recompense.

verses.content: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعْتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ
verses.translation: And none can deny it except every transgressor beyond bounds, (in disbelief, oppression and disobedience of Allah, the sinner!)

verses.content: إِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ آيَاتُنَا قَالَ أَسَاطِيرُ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: When Our Verses (of the Quran) are recited to him he says: "Tales of the ancients!"

verses.content: كَلَّا ۖ بَلْ ۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُوا يَكْسِبُونَ
verses.translation: Nay! But on their hearts is the Ran (covering of sins and evil deeds) which they used to earn.

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّهُمْ عَن رَّبِّهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ لَّمَحْجُوبُونَ
verses.translation: Nay! Surely, they (evil-doers) will be veiled from seeing their Lord that Day.

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِنَّهُمْ لَصَالُو الْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: Then, verily they will indeed enter and taste the burning flame of Hell.

verses.content: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَـٰذَا الَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: Then, it will be said to them: "This is what you used to deny!"

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّ كِتَابَ الْأَبْرَارِ لَفِي عِلِّيِّينَ
verses.translation: Nay! Verily, the Record (writing of the deeds) of Al-Abrar (the pious who fear Allah and avoid evil), is (preserved) in 'Illiyyun.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا عِلِّيُّونَ
verses.translation: And what will make you know what 'Illiyyun is?

verses.content: كِتَابٌ مَّرْقُومٌ
verses.translation: A Register inscribed.

verses.content: يَشْهَدُهُ الْمُقَرَّبُونَ
verses.translation: To which bear witness those nearest (to Allah, i.e. the angels).

verses.content: إِنَّ الْأَبْرَارَ لَفِي نَعِيمٍ
verses.translation: Verily, Al-Abrar (the pious who fear Allah and avoid evil) will be in delight (Paradise).

verses.content: عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.translation: On thrones, looking (at all things).

verses.content: تَعْرِفُ فِي وُجُوهِهِمْ نَضْرَةَ النَّعِيمِ
verses.translation: You will recognise in their faces the brightness of delight.

verses.content: يُسْقَوْنَ مِن رَّحِيقٍ مَّخْتُومٍ
verses.translation: They will be given to drink pure sealed wine.

verses.content: خِتَامُهُ مِسْكٌ ۚ وَفِي ذَٰلِكَ فَلْيَتَنَافَسِ الْمُتَنَافِسُونَ
verses.translation: The last thereof (that wine) will be the smell of musk, and for this let (all) those strive who want to strive (i.e. hasten earnestly to the obedience of Allah).

verses.content: وَمِزَاجُهُ مِن تَسْنِيمٍ
verses.translation: It (that wine) will be mixed with Tasnim.

verses.content: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا الْمُقَرَّبُونَ
verses.translation: A spring whereof drink those nearest to Allah.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ أَجْرَمُوا كَانُوا مِنَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا يَضْحَكُونَ
verses.translation: Verily! (During the worldly life) those who committed crimes used to laugh at those who believed.

verses.content: وَإِذَا مَرُّوا بِهِمْ يَتَغَامَزُونَ
verses.translation: And whenever they passed by them, used to wink one to another (in mockery);

verses.content: وَإِذَا انقَلَبُوا إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِمُ انقَلَبُوا فَكِهِينَ
verses.translation: And when they returned to their own people, they would return jesting;

verses.content: وَإِذَا رَأَوْهُمْ قَالُوا إِنَّ هَـٰؤُلَاءِ لَضَالُّونَ
verses.translation: And when they saw them, they said: "Verily! These have indeed gone astray!"

verses.content: وَمَا أُرْسِلُوا عَلَيْهِمْ حَافِظِينَ
verses.translation: But they (disbelievers, sinners) had not been sent as watchers over them (the believers).

verses.content: فَالْيَوْمَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا مِنَ الْكُفَّارِ يَضْحَكُونَ
verses.translation: But this Day (the Day of Resurrection) those who believe will laugh at the disbelievers

verses.content: عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.translation: On (high) thrones, looking (at all things).

verses.content: هَلْ ثُوِّبَ الْكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُوا يَفْعَلُونَ
verses.translation: Are not the disbelievers paid (fully) for what they used to do?

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا السَّمَاءُ انشَقَّتْ
verses.translation: When the heaven is split asunder,

verses.content: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ
verses.translation: And listens and obeys its Lord, and it must do so;

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْأَرْضُ مُدَّتْ
verses.translation: And when the earth is stretched forth,

verses.content: وَأَلْقَتْ مَا فِيهَا وَتَخَلَّتْ
verses.translation: And has cast out all that was in it and became empty,

verses.content: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ
verses.translation: And listens and obeys its Lord, and it must do so;

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا الْإِنسَانُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدْحًا فَمُلَاقِيهِ
verses.translation: O man! Verily, you are returning towards your Lord with your deeds and actions (good or bad), a sure returning, so you will meet (i.e. the results of your deeds which you did).

verses.content: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِيَ كِتَابَهُ بِيَمِينِهِ
verses.translation: Then, as for him who will be given his Record in his right hand,

verses.content: فَسَوْفَ يُحَاسَبُ حِسَابًا يَسِيرًا
verses.translation: He surely will receive an easy reckoning,

verses.content: وَيَنقَلِبُ إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِ مَسْرُورًا
verses.translation: And will return to his family in joy!

verses.content: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِيَ كِتَابَهُ وَرَاءَ ظَهْرِهِ
verses.translation: But whosoever is given his Record behind his back,

verses.content: فَسَوْفَ يَدْعُو ثُبُورًا
verses.translation: He will invoke (his) destruction,

verses.content: وَيَصْلَىٰ سَعِيرًا
verses.translation: And shall enter a blazing Fire, and made to taste its burning.

verses.content: إِنَّهُ كَانَ فِي أَهْلِهِ مَسْرُورًا
verses.translation: Verily, he was among his people in joy!

verses.content: إِنَّهُ ظَنَّ أَن لَّن يَحُورَ
verses.translation: Verily, he thought that he would never come back (to Us)!

verses.content: بَلَىٰ إِنَّ رَبَّهُ كَانَ بِهِ بَصِيرًا
verses.translation: Yes! Verily, his Lord has been ever beholding him!

verses.content: فَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِالشَّفَقِ
verses.translation: So I swear by the afterglow of sunset;

verses.content: وَاللَّيْلِ وَمَا وَسَقَ
verses.translation: And by the night and whatever it gathers in its darkness;

verses.content: وَالْقَمَرِ إِذَا اتَّسَقَ
verses.translation: And by the moon when it is at the full,

verses.content: لَتَرْكَبُنَّ طَبَقًا عَن طَبَقٍ
verses.translation: You shall certainly travel from stage to stage (in this life and in the Hereafter).

verses.content: فَمَا لَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: What is the matter with them, that they believe not?

verses.content: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيْهِمُ الْقُرْآنُ لَا يَسْجُدُونَ ۩
verses.translation: And when the Quran is recited to them, they fall not prostrate,

verses.content: بَلِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا يُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: Nay, (on the contrary), those who disbelieve, belie (Prophet Muhammad (Peace be upon him) and whatever he brought, i.e. this Quran and Islamic Monotheism, etc.).

verses.content: وَاللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يُوعُونَ
verses.translation: And Allah knows best what they gather (of good and bad deeds),

verses.content: فَبَشِّرْهُم بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
verses.translation: So announce to them a painful torment.

verses.content: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ لَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ
verses.translation: Save those who believe and do righteous good deeds, for them is a reward that will never come to an end (i.e. Paradise).

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالسَّمَاءِ ذَاتِ الْبُرُوجِ
verses.translation: By the heaven, holding the big stars.

verses.content: وَالْيَوْمِ الْمَوْعُودِ
verses.translation: And by the Promised Day (i.e. the Day of Resurrection);

verses.content: وَشَاهِدٍ وَمَشْهُودٍ
verses.translation: And by the witnessing day (i.e. Friday), and by the witnessed day [i.e. the day of 'Arafat (Hajj) the ninth of Dhul-Hijjah];

verses.content: قُتِلَ أَصْحَابُ الْأُخْدُودِ
verses.translation: Cursed were the people of the ditch (the story of the Boy and the King).

verses.content: النَّارِ ذَاتِ الْوَقُودِ
verses.translation: Fire supplied (abundantly) with fuel,

verses.content: إِذْ هُمْ عَلَيْهَا قُعُودٌ
verses.translation: When they sat by it (fire),

verses.content: وَهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفْعَلُونَ بِالْمُؤْمِنِينَ شُهُودٌ
verses.translation: And they witnessed what they were doing against the believers (i.e. burning them).

verses.content: وَمَا نَقَمُوا مِنْهُمْ إِلَّا أَن يُؤْمِنُوا بِاللَّهِ الْعَزِيزِ الْحَمِيدِ
verses.translation: They had nothing against them, except that they believed in Allah, the All-Mighty, Worthy of all Praise!

verses.content: الَّذِي لَهُ مُلْكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ شَهِيدٌ
verses.translation: Who, to Whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth! And Allah is Witness over everything.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ فَتَنُوا الْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَتُوبُوا فَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ الْحَرِيقِ
verses.translation: Verily, those who put into trial the believing men and believing women (by torturing them and burning them), and then do not turn in repentance, (to Allah), will have the torment of Hell, and they will have the punishment of the burning Fire.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ لَهُمْ جَنَّاتٌ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ الْفَوْزُ الْكَبِيرُ
verses.translation: Verily, those who believe and do righteous good deeds, for them will be Gardens under which rivers flow (Paradise). That is the great success.

verses.content: إِنَّ بَطْشَ رَبِّكَ لَشَدِيدٌ
verses.translation: Verily, (O Muhammad (Peace be upon him)) the Grip (Punishment) of your Lord is severe.

verses.content: إِنَّهُ هُوَ يُبْدِئُ وَيُعِيدُ
verses.translation: Verily, He it is Who begins (punishment) and repeats (punishment in the Hereafter) (or originates the creation of everything, and then repeats it on the Day of Resurrection).

verses.content: وَهُوَ الْغَفُورُ الْوَدُودُ
verses.translation: And He is Oft-Forgiving, full of love (towards the pious who are real true believers of Islamic Monotheism),

verses.content: ذُو الْعَرْشِ الْمَجِيدُ
verses.translation: Owner of the throne, the Glorious

verses.content: فَعَّالٌ لِّمَا يُرِيدُ
verses.translation: He does what He intends (or wills).

verses.content: هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ الْجُنُودِ
verses.translation: Has the story reached you of the hosts,

verses.content: فِرْعَوْنَ وَثَمُودَ
verses.translation: Of Fir'aun (Pharaoh) and Thamud?

verses.content: بَلِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا فِي تَكْذِيبٍ
verses.translation: Nay! The disbelievers (persisted) in denying (Prophet Muhammad (Peace be upon him) and his Message of Islamic Monotheism).

verses.content: وَاللَّهُ مِن وَرَائِهِم مُّحِيطٌ
verses.translation: And Allah encompasses them from behind! (i.e. all their deeds are within His Knowledge, and He will requite them for their deeds).

verses.content: بَلْ هُوَ قُرْآنٌ مَّجِيدٌ
verses.translation: Nay! This is a Glorious Quran,

verses.content: فِي لَوْحٍ مَّحْفُوظٍ
verses.translation: (Inscribed) in Al-Lauh Al-Mahfuz (The Preserved Tablet)!

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالسَّمَاءِ وَالطَّارِقِ
verses.translation: By the heaven, and At-Tariq (the night-comer, i.e. the bright star);

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الطَّارِقُ
verses.translation: And what will make you to know what At-Tariq (night-comer) is?

verses.content: النَّجْمُ الثَّاقِبُ
verses.translation: (It is) the star of piercing brightness;

verses.content: إِن كُلُّ نَفْسٍ لَّمَّا عَلَيْهَا حَافِظٌ
verses.translation: There is no human being but has a protector over him (or her) (i.e. angels incharge of each human being guarding him, writing his good and bad deeds, etc.)

verses.content: فَلْيَنظُرِ الْإِنسَانُ مِمَّ خُلِقَ
verses.translation: So let man see from what he is created!

verses.content: خُلِقَ مِن مَّاءٍ دَافِقٍ
verses.translation: He is created from a water gushing forth.

verses.content: يَخْرُجُ مِن بَيْنِ الصُّلْبِ وَالتَّرَائِبِ
verses.translation: Proceeding from between the back-bone and the ribs,

verses.content: إِنَّهُ عَلَىٰ رَجْعِهِ لَقَادِرٌ
verses.translation: Verily, (Allah) is Able to bring him back (to life)!

verses.content: يَوْمَ تُبْلَى السَّرَائِرُ
verses.translation: The Day when all the secrets (deeds, prayers, fasting, etc.) will be examined (as to their truth).

verses.content: فَمَا لَهُ مِن قُوَّةٍ وَلَا نَاصِرٍ
verses.translation: Then will (man) have no power, nor any helper.

verses.content: وَالسَّمَاءِ ذَاتِ الرَّجْعِ
verses.translation: By the sky (having rain clouds) which gives rain, again and again.

verses.content: وَالْأَرْضِ ذَاتِ الصَّدْعِ
verses.translation: And the earth which splits (with the growth of trees and plants),

verses.content: إِنَّهُ لَقَوْلٌ فَصْلٌ
verses.translation: Verily! This (the Quran) is the Word that separates (the truth from falsehood, and commands strict legal laws for mankind to cut the roots of evil).

verses.content: وَمَا هُوَ بِالْهَزْلِ
verses.translation: And it is not a thing for amusement.

verses.content: إِنَّهُمْ يَكِيدُونَ كَيْدًا
verses.translation: Verily, they are but plotting a plot (against you O Muhammad (Peace be upon him)).

verses.content: وَأَكِيدُ كَيْدًا
verses.translation: And I (too) am planning a plan.

verses.content: فَمَهِّلِ الْكَافِرِينَ أَمْهِلْهُمْ رُوَيْدًا
verses.translation: So give a respite to the disbelievers. Deal you gently with them for a while.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ سَبِّحِ اسْمَ رَبِّكَ الْأَعْلَى
verses.translation: Glorify the Name of your Lord, the Most High,

verses.content: الَّذِي خَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ
verses.translation: Who has created (everything), and then proportioned it;

verses.content: وَالَّذِي قَدَّرَ فَهَدَىٰ
verses.translation: And Who has measured (preordainments for each and everything even to be blessed or wretched); then guided (i.e. showed mankind the right as well as wrong paths, and guided the animals to pasture);

verses.content: وَالَّذِي أَخْرَجَ الْمَرْعَىٰ
verses.translation: And Who brings out the pasturage,

verses.content: فَجَعَلَهُ غُثَاءً أَحْوَىٰ
verses.translation: And then makes it dark stubble.

verses.content: سَنُقْرِئُكَ فَلَا تَنسَىٰ
verses.translation: We shall make you to recite (the Quran), so you (O Muhammad (Peace be upon him)) shall not forget (it),

verses.content: إِلَّا مَا شَاءَ اللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّهُ يَعْلَمُ الْجَهْرَ وَمَا يَخْفَىٰ
verses.translation: Except what Allah, may will, He knows what is apparent and what is hidden.

verses.content: وَنُيَسِّرُكَ لِلْيُسْرَىٰ
